languages.text: Targets in a 1-cell radius suffer <u>(from 8 to 10)</u> mental {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} and gain 6 stacks of the {g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}disturbed{/g} effect. Starting from the next {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, 1 stack of disturbed is removed every round. Also, the grenade decreases the target's {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g} by −1 until the end of combat. This effect does not stack and affects the target even if they {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} this grenade.
languages.original_text: Цели в радиусе 1 клетки получают <u>(от 8 до 10)</u> психического {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g} и 6 уровней эффекта {g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}тревожности{/g}. Начиная со следующего {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунда{/g} каждый раунд 1 уровень эффекта снимается. Также эта граната понижает {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}пси-рейтинг{/g} цели на 1 до конца боя. Эффект не суммируется и действует даже на цели, уклонившиеся от гранаты.

traits.locale_text:
Deals 8-10 Mental damage within the area and inflicts 3 stacks of disturbed effect on targets.
Every next round one stack of this disturbed effect is removed.

Deals 8-10 mental damage within the area and inflicts 3 stacks of the disturbed effect on targets.
Every following round, one stack of this disturbed effect is removed.

Deals 8-10 mental damage within the area and inflicts 3 stacks of the disturbed effect on targets.
Every following round, one stack of this disturbed effect is removed.

languages.text: Цели в радиусе 1 клетки получают <u>(от 8 до 10)</u> психического {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g} и 6 уровней эффекта {g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}тревожности{/g}. Начиная со следующего {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунда{/g} каждый раунд 1 уровень эффекта снимается. Также эта граната понижает {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}пси-рейтинг{/g} цели на 1 до конца боя. Эффект не суммируется и действует даже на цели, уклонившиеся от гранаты.
languages.original_text:
Deals 8-10 mental damage within the area and inflicts 3 stacks of the disturbed effect on targets.
Every following round, one stack of this disturbed effect is removed.

traits.locale_text:
Наносит 8–10 психического урона по области и накладывает на цели 3 уровня эффекта "тревожность".
В каждом следующем раунде 1 уровень эффекта снимается.

Наносит 8–10 психического урона по области и накладывает на цели 3 уровня эффекта "тревожность".
В каждом следующем раунде 1 уровень эффекта снимается.

languages.text: 对目标区域造成<u>8-10</u>点精神{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}，并对所有目标施加6层{g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}惊扰{/g}效果。在接下来的每一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}中，移除1层“惊扰”效果。此外，此手雷会使目标的{g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}灵能等级{/g}降低1级。此效果不会叠加，会持续至战斗结束。即便目标{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}了这枚手雷的攻击，也同样会受到此效果影响。
languages.original_text: Targets in a 1-cell radius suffer <u>(from 8 to 10)</u> mental {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} and gain 6 stacks of the {g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}disturbed{/g} effect. Starting from the next {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, 1 stack of disturbed is removed every round. Also, the grenade decreases the target's {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g} by −1 until the end of combat. This effect does not stack and affects the target even if they {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} this grenade.

traits.locale_text:
对目标区域造成8-10点{g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}精神伤害{/g}，并对所有目标施加3层{g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}惊扰{/g}效果。
在接下来的每一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}中，移除1层“惊扰”效果。

languages.text: Los objetivos en un radio de 1 casilla sufren <u>(de 8 a 10){g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary} de </u>daño{/g} mental y 6 acumulaciones del efecto {g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}perturbado{/g}. A partir de siguiente {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}, se elimina 1 acumulación de perturbado cada asalto. Además, la granada reduce el {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}factor psíquico{/g} del objetivo en −1 hasta el final del combate. Este efecto no se acumula y afecta al objetivo aunque {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquive{/g} la granada.
languages.original_text: Targets in a 1-cell radius suffer <u>(from 8 to 10)</u> mental {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} and gain 6 stacks of the {g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}disturbed{/g} effect. Starting from the next {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, 1 stack of disturbed is removed every round. Also, the grenade decreases the target's {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g} by −1 until the end of combat. This effect does not stack and affects the target even if they {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} this grenade.

traits.locale_text:
Inflige 8–10 de {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}daño mental{/g} a las criaturas del área e inflige 3 acumulaciones del efecto {g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}perturbado{/g} a los objetivos.
Cada {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g} subsiguiente, se elimina una acumulación de este efecto perturbado.

languages.text: 半径1マス以内のターゲットは、<u>8～10</u>の精神的{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を受け、蓄積数6の{g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}動揺{/g}効果を付与される。次の{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}から、ラウンドが進むにつれて動揺の蓄積数が1つずつ消える。また、このグレネードは戦闘終了までターゲットの{g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}超能力レート{/g}を−1減少させる。この効果は蓄積されず、ターゲットがグレネードを{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避{/g}した場合でも効果を発動する。
languages.original_text: Targets in a 1-cell radius suffer <u>(from 8 to 10)</u> mental {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} and gain 6 stacks of the {g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}disturbed{/g} effect. Starting from the next {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, 1 stack of disturbed is removed every round. Also, the grenade decreases the target's {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g} by −1 until the end of combat. This effect does not stack and affects the target even if they {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} this grenade.

traits.locale_text:
範囲内に8-10の{g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}精神ダメージ{/g}を与え、ターゲットに3スタックの{g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}動揺{/g}効果を付与する。
以降、1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}ごとに、動揺効果が1スタックずつ解除されていく。

languages.text: Ziele in einem 1-Feld-Radius erleiden <u>(von 8 bis 10)</u> Mental-{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} und erhalten 6 Stapel des Effekts {g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}Verstört{/g}. Mit Beginn der nächsten {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} wird jede Runde 1 Stapel „Verstört“ entfernt. Außerdem verringert die Granate den {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}Psi-Wert{/g} des Ziels bis zum Ende des Kampfes um −1. Dieser Effekt kann nicht gestacked werden und wirkt auch auf das Ziel, wenn es dieser Granate {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}ausweicht{/g}.
languages.original_text: Targets in a 1-cell radius suffer <u>(from 8 to 10)</u> mental {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} and gain 6 stacks of the {g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}disturbed{/g} effect. Starting from the next {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, 1 stack of disturbed is removed every round. Also, the grenade decreases the target's {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g} by −1 until the end of combat. This effect does not stack and affects the target even if they {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} this grenade.

traits.locale_text:
Fügt 8–10 {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}Mentalschaden{/g} innerhalb des Bereichs zu und 3 Stapel des Effekts {g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}Verstört{/g} bei Zielen.
Jede folgende {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} wird ein Stapel des Effekts „Verstört“ entfernt.

languages.text: Les cibles dans un rayon de 1 case subissent <u>(entre 8 et 10)</u> points de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} mentaux et 6 cumuls de l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}Perturbation{/g}. À partir du prochain {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, 1 cumul de Perturbation est dissipé à chaque round. De plus, la grenade réduit l'{g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}indice psy{/g} de la cible de −1 jusqu'à la fin du combat. Cet effet n'est pas cumulable et affecte la cible même si celle-ci {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquive{/g} la grenade.
languages.original_text: Targets in a 1-cell radius suffer <u>(from 8 to 10)</u> mental {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} and gain 6 stacks of the {g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}disturbed{/g} effect. Starting from the next {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, 1 stack of disturbed is removed every round. Also, the grenade decreases the target's {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g} by −1 until the end of combat. This effect does not stack and affects the target even if they {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} this grenade.

traits.locale_text:
Inflige 8 à 10 points de {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}dégâts mentaux{/g} dans la zone et 3 cumuls de l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}Perturbation{/g} aux cibles.
À chaque {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} suivant, un cumul de l'effet Perturbation disparaît.
